Available filtering logic: title, host, port, descriptionPlain.
</remarks>

plain.description: Holds description in plain text only, without HTML tags.
plain.example: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s.

plainShort.example: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting indus...

Dataedo.Public.Models.Public.v1.Common.D.description: Description of the requested object. It contains plain text description only.

creationDate.description: Gets or sets the time record was created.

createdBy.description: Gets or sets the user that created record.

lastModificationDate.description: Gets or sets the time record was updated.

modifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the user that updated record.

source.description: Gets or sets the source (DBMS or USER) of object.

Dataedo.Public.Models.Public.v1.Common.M.description: The class providing the record metadata (creation and modification information).

creationDate.description: Gets or sets the time record was created.

createdBy.description: Gets or sets the user that created record.

lastModificationDate.description: Gets or sets the time record was updated.

modifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the user that updated record.

source.description: Gets or sets the source (DBMS or USER) of object.

databaseCreationDate.description: Gets or sets the time object was created.

databaseLastModificationDate.description: Gets or sets the time object was last updated.

importDate.description: Gets or sets the time of last import from database.

importedBy.description: Gets or sets the login of user that last imported object from database.

Dataedo.Public.Models.Public.v1.Common.O.description: The class providing metadata (creation in DBMS, import, creation and modification information).

id.description: Area entity id in Dataedo repository.
Area entity id in Dataedo repository.

source.description: Source of the row: 'DBMS' for imported from a database, 'USER' for manually defined by a user in Dataedo repository.

nullable.description: True if column is nullable, false otherwise.

isIdentity.description: Is column an identity/auto incremented column. 1 - identity/auto increment, 0 - otherwise.

isComputed.description: Is column a computed column. 1 - computed column, 0 - regular column. If the column is computed, the calculation formula is imported to computed_formula field.

computedFormula.description: Calculation formula for computed columns. NULL for regular fields.

defaultValue.description: Formula of column default value. NULL if the column has not default value specification.

dataLength.description: Data length/precision as text. Depending on data type it can have different formats, e.g. "100", "5,4", "MAX" etc. Null if the column has no length/precision defined.

ordinalPosition.description: Position of the column in a table in DBMS.

sort.description: Alternative column sorting defined by user in Dataedo.

status.description: 'D' if the column was deleted in DBMS, 'A' otherwise. Deleted columns aren't exported to documentation.

level.description: Hierarchy level for hierarchical structures. Regular "flat" structures such as tables have 1.

id.description: Column entity id in Dataedo repository.

lookupId.description: Lookup which values are stored in this column.

parentId.description: Parent column for hierarchical data structures.

path.description: Column path for hierarchical structures, e.g. field author.address.street will have street as name and author.address as path.

name.description: Column entity name in Dataedo repository.

title.description: Column entity title in Dataedo repository.

id.description: Column entity id in Dataedo repository.

lookupId.description: Lookup which values are stored in this column.

parentId.description: Parent column for hierarchical data structures.

path.description: Column path for hierarchical structures, e.g. field author.address.street will have street as name and author.address as path.

name.description: Column entity name in Dataedo repository.

title.description: Column entity title in Dataedo repository.

id.description: Custom field class entity id in Dataedo repository.

value.description: Custom field value in specific to custom field definition format.

id.description: Custom field entity id in Dataedo repository.

name.description:
Name of the column in physical tables where custom field is stored,
e.g. field1 (which is in all schema tables, i.e. tables.field1, columns.field1...).

code.description: Text code set on creation of the field.

type.description:
Field type:
TEXT - plain text field,
LIST_CLOSED - closed drop-down,
LIST_OPEN - open drop-down
MULTI_VALUE_LIST_CLOSED - closed multi-select drop-down
INTEGER - number
CHECKBOX - checkbox

definition.description: List of values for lists as text separated with commas. E.g. 'Blue, Red, Green'.

values.description: Values added by the user using the drop-down list for open lists.

tableVisibility.description: Is field available for tables and views (columns are defined separately).

procedureVisibility.description: Is field available for procedures and functions (columns are defined separately).

columnVisibility.description: Is field available for tables and views columns.

relationVisibility.description: Is field available for table/view relations.

keyVisibility.description: Is field available for table/view primary/unique keys.

termVisibility.description: Is field available for business glossary term.

lookupValueVisibility.description: Is field available for lookups values.

source.description: Source of the row: 'DBMS' for imported from database, 'USER' for manual defined by user in Dataedo repository.

status.description: 'D' if table/view was deleted from DBMS, 'A' otherwise.

language.description: Language of the script, if relevant (e.g. views). If null then it is assumed to be 'SQL'.

externalId.description: ID of the row in an external system. Used for synchronization.

linkedSourceId.description: ID of the linked source which defines source database for an object.

statsWhereFilter.description: Contains WHERE filter. Used in filtering of Sample data in Data Profiling.

statsSource.description: Name of the source of statistics. 'Profiling' for Data Profiling.

statsRowCount.description: Number of rows, found in the table during the last saved lookup.

statsRowCountFiltered.description: Contains the number of profiling rows with the filter applied (the filter is stored in the Dataedo.Public.Models.Public.v1.Features.DataSets.Responses.DataSetProperties.StatsWhereFilter).

statsDatetime.description: Time of the last saved lookup.

id.description: Data set entity id in Dataedo repository

name.description: Data set entity name in Dataedo repository.

title.description: Data set entity title in Dataedo repository.

databaseId.description: Database id in Dataedo repository which contains the data set

parentObjectType.description: Object type of the parent object.

updateId.description: ID of the last schema import/update from the source database where the element was created/modified.

id.description: Data set entity id in Dataedo repository

name.description: Data set entity name in Dataedo repository.

title.description: Data set entity title in Dataedo repository.

databaseId.description: Database id in Dataedo repository which contains the data set

parentObjectType.description: Object type of the parent object.

updateId.description: ID of the last schema import/update from the source database where the element was created/modified.

Dataedo.Public.Models.Public.v1.Features.description: This class is used to describe the simple data set response. It contains only the basic information about the table.

id.description: Data source entity id in Dataedo repository.

name.description: Data source entity name in Dataedo repository.

title.description: Data set source title in Dataedo repository.

type.description:
Type of documentation:
for DBMS its the type: ORACLE, SQLSERVER, etc.,
MANUAL for manual documentations,
BUSINESS_GLOSSARY for business glossary.

guid.description: Unique documentation identifier, unique across repositories.

dbmsVersion.description: DBMS version as returned by DBMS at the time of last connection.

filter.description: Import filter definition saved in XML format.

authenticationDatabase.description: Name of the database to authenticate the user in.

perspectiveName.description: Perspective name of SSAS Tabular Model.

showSchema.description: Flag that indicates whether table names should include schema name, e.g. dbo.customer vs customer.

differentSchema.description: Used for Oracle: 1 if user selected schema different than user, 0 otherwise.

multipleSchemas.description: Used for Oracle: 1 if multiple schemas were selected.

id.description: Data source entity id in Dataedo repository.

name.description: Data source entity name in Dataedo repository.

title.description: Data set source title in Dataedo repository.

type.description:
Type of documentation:
for DBMS its the type: ORACLE, SQLSERVER, etc.,
MANUAL for manual documentations,
BUSINESS_GLOSSARY for business glossary.

Dataedo.Public.Models.Public.v1.Features.description: This class is used to describe the simple data set response. It contains only the basic information about the table.

Domain Id in Dataedo repository.

id.description: Glossary entry Id in Dataedo repository.

typeId.description: Type of term: term, policy, category, etc.

id.description: Type id

code.description: Code of the item type - ENTITY, POLICY, RULE, CATEGORY

listName.description: Plural name on the list in Web Catalog - Terms, Categories, Rules, Policies

id.description: Glossary entry Id in Dataedo repository.

glossaryId.description: Database id in Dataedo repository which contains the table.

typeId.description: Type of term: term, policy, category, etc.

Dataedo.Public.Models.Public.v1.Features.description: This class is used to describe the simple program response. It contains only the basic information about the program.

id.description: Represents the Id of the linked object.

type.description: Represents the type of the linked object.

subType.description: Represents the sub type of the linked object.

name.description: represents the name of the linked object.

title.description: represents the title of the linked object.

status.description: 'D' if table/view was deleted from DBMS, 'A' otherwise.

source.description: Source of the row: 'DBMS' for imported from database, 'USER' for manual defined by user in Dataedo repository

Dataedo.Public.Models.Public.v1.Features.description: Represents a response containing information about a linked object.

dataLength.description: Data length/precision as text. Depending on data type it can have different formats, e.g. "100", "5,4", "MAX" etc. Null if the parameter has no length/precision defined.

status.description: 'D' if parameter was deleted from DBMS, 'A' otherwise.

source.description: Source of the row: 'DBMS' for imported from a database, 'USER' for manually defined by a user in Dataedo repository.

ordinalPosition.description: Position of parameter in parameters list.

id.description: Parameter Id in Dataedo repository.

name.description: Parameter name, "Returns" for a function's output.

procedureId.description: Procedure to which the parameter belongs.

Dataedo.Public.Models.Public.v1.Features.description: This class is used to describe the simple parameter response. It contains only the basic information about the parameter.

id.description: Program ID in Dataedo repository.

name.description: Program entity name in Dataedo repository.

databaseId.description: Database id in Dataedo repository which contains the table.

parentObjectType.description: Object type of the parent object.

updateId.description: ID of the last schema import/update from the source database where the element was created/modified.

definition.example: CREATE PROCEDURE InsertCustomer @FirstName NVARCHAR(50) AS BEGIN INSERT INTO customers (first_name) values (@FirstName); END;

externalId.description: ID of the row in an external system. Used for synchronization.

functionType.description: Type of function as defined in DBMS.

language.description: Language of the script, if relevant (e.g. views). If null then it is assumed to be 'SQL'.

linkedSourceId.description: ID of the linked source which defines source database for an object.

status.description: 'D' if table/view was deleted from DBMS, 'A' otherwise.

source.description: Source of the row: 'DBMS' for imported from database, 'USER' for manual defined by user in Dataedo repository.

id.description: Program ID in Dataedo repository.

name.description: Program entity name in Dataedo repository.

databaseId.description: Database id in Dataedo repository which contains the table.

parentObjectType.description: Object type of the parent object.

updateId.description: ID of the last schema import/update from the source database where the element was created/modified.

Dataedo.Public.Models.Public.v1.Features.description: This class is used to describe the simple program response. It contains only the basic information about the program.

embedUrl.description: URL used to embed report in external systems.

url.description: URL under which report is available.

language.description: Programming language in which report was created.

status.description: 'D' if report was deleted from DBMS, 'A' otherwise.

source.description: Source of the row: 'DBMS' for imported from database, 'USER' for manual defined by user in Dataedo repository.

id.description: Report id in Dataedo repository.

name.description: Data set entity name in Dataedo repository.
